| description    = Badrwn, an orlan warrior from the Fisher Crane tribe, served Eír Glanfath with distinction during the War of the Black Trees. He was infamous among the encroaching soldiers of the Dyrwood for his rapid, daring raids into the hearts of their outposts, primarily under the cover of darkness. Badrwn's cloak, much like its former owner, is a practical thing. Dirt, moss, and blood have made the simple homespun garment into a mottled mosaic that seems to disappear amongst the rocks and trees. The frayed hem is silent, even when drawn over stone and dry leaves.

With the Glanfathan defeat and the end of the war, Badrwn and his most loyal followers made their way to the Deadfire, where they plundered merchant ships for many years. This cloak is all that remains of the fabled leader.
